summary: This is an email forwarding a letter from attorney Christian Everdell to other parties, likely regarding discovery matters in the Epstein case. The email includes a confidentiality notice and indicates the attached letter is intended for specific recipients.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney at Cohen & Gresser LLP who sent the attached letter regarding discovery matters.

keyFacts: Attorney Christian Everdell sent a confidential letter regarding discovery on October 1, 2020.
The email was forwarded on October 2, 2020, with a request to discuss the matter later that day.
The correspondence includes strong confidentiality protections and privacy policy references.
The law firm Cohen & Gresser has offices in multiple international locations.
